message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%, but we can negotiate.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can have 60% and I'll take 40%.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than 60%. Let's split it 70/30,  I'll take 700000 and you get 300000. This is a fair compromise, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. 55% is a good compromise, considering the inflation. You'll get 450000 and I'll take 550000.
I'm still holding out for a better deal.  Let's split it 65/35,  I'll take 650000 and you get 350000.  This is a fairer deal considering the inflation that has taken place.
I'm getting close to accepting. 50/50 is a fair split, considering the inflation. Let's meet in the middle and split it evenly.
